summary: Amidst religious riots, a son deals with his mother's life-threatening injuries, and her last request.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Pooja Bhatt|Nagarjuna Akkineni|Sonali Bendre|Akshay Anand|Kunal Khemu|Avtar Gill|Sharat Saxena|Ashutosh Rana|Madan Jain|Saurabh Shukla|Vishwajeet Pradhan|Amardeep Jha|Namrata Dhamija|Zafar Karachiwala|Anupam Shyam|Naresh Suri|Gyan Prakash|Praveen|Suresh Desai|Manoj Verma|Master Dhananjay
title: Zakhm
